name: bazookaradio
text:
"Well maybe I do, let's see."

I love you Roast Beef.

name: hellofyellin
text:
DO NOT TRY TO MAKE A BULLSHIT SUNRISE.

IT IS NOT GOOD TO DRINK.

name: werewolves
text: Some friends and I tried, and it went really damn well. I forget what was in it, but Cuervo was a main component.

name: boredom_man
text: Substituting triple sec for grenadine can produce such as a Ghetto Sunrise for emergencies.

name: hamscout
text: It is reasons such as this that I now attempt to keep a respectable decency bar in my home at all times.

name: hellofyellin
text: This is a sound policy.

name: catachresis
text: My zines I ordered better be in with my dang post tomorrow or I will be hell of pissed off

name: chaesar
text: I think plantation owners also wrote "Happy Birthday"

name: senseihollywood
text: and "Heart and Soul"

name: i_love_kate
text:
And "Ebony and Ivory".

"Work together through sla-ve-ry!"

name: dicklaurent
text: Ray answers the questions pretty much like Miles David did in many of his interviews conducted by white people.

name: dicklaurent
text: By Miled I mean Miles. Sorry.

name: dicklaurent
text: MILES DAVIS. Not David.

name: senseihollywood
text: that's what you get for trying to type while drinking Bullshit Sunrises...

name: petro
text: What airline does one get 50 cL bottles of booze? Talk about getting airsick.

name: madnes
text: What airline does not. Is what I'm asking you.

name: madnes
text: God, 7 months ago madnes. Learn the metric system from a book and then apply that knowledge!

name: heavymetaljesus
text: A comment left by heavymetaljesus was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by straw, cameasiam, ShiroBen, decagon, yellowcardigan, coffeecoaster)

name: _cheesekayke
text: I believe there is.

name: gouldgonewild
text: uhh...?

name: samuraieaux
text: "Hold on, I'm writing this down" reminds me of looking into two mirrors facing each other and seeing the endless reflections of yourself.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: i can see how this would make so much sense.

name: aelindil
text: I like to think that Beef, while searching for a name for his 'zine, asked Ray what he thought, and "man why you even got to do a thing" was the response.

name: redmange
text:
The only thing that makes me lose respect for Ray is his love of Hip-Hop.

Also, Bullshit Sunrise is a wonderful drink, don't believe the hype.

name: coffeecoaster
text: The only thing that makes me lose respect for you is the fact that you lost respect Ray because of his love of hip-hop.

name: boredom_man
text: redmange carefully sips on his tequila and tang and considers that which is hoi polloi

name: charchar
text: "Chopsticks" was written by an adolescent girl named Euphemia Allen under the name "Arthur de Lulli because she felt a lady-composer would not be taken seriously. Golly, how much did Euphemia want to be taken seriously.

name: zapatos
text: She probably shouldn't have written Chopsticks then.

name: numberkillinger
text: Its sort of a shame that Onstad hates hip hop so much. Judging hip hop on the basis of the mainstream stuff you have heard is like hating on rock music because nickelback are awful.

name: shirono
text: So did anyone ever come to a conclusion as to whether Bullshit Sunrises are good or not? Cause damn I'd like to drink one just for the sick name.

name: thegreatestcape
text:
While reading this strip, all I could think of was how out of place Ray's words seemed transcribed like this.

Then I realised everything he says I have read from speech bubbles.

Such is the power to immerse of Achewood.
